data.oai_dc:dc: The file contains fecundity measurements for females dosed with carboplatin, gemcitabine, methotrexate, or mitomycin C using the DSPR panel of recombinant inbred lines and an ABcross design (see http://FlyRILs.org for details about the DSPR and the cross design). There are 3 replicate measures for each cross. See readme file for column names.
pharmacogenomics|drug therapy|quantitative trait loci|chemotoxicity|Drosophila Synthetic Population Resource|carboplatin|gemcitabine|mitomyci
